body:
Features and Enhancements

Components
  • New Features or Enhancements
    • Expanded Help Section to include - Confirmed.
      • The confirmed indicator in Network360 allows users to gauge the validity of a provider or provider location / access point.

      • Frequently Asked Questions:
        • Where can I use the confirmed indicator in Network360?
          • The option to use Confirmed records is available in several reports:
            • Competitive Dashboard
            • Compare Networks
            • Create a List

        • How is the confirmed indicator calculated?
          • The confirmed indicator is driven by two different methodologies:
            • Confirmed Dental
              • For dental clients who contribute claims, the indicator is driven by providers associated with a claim verified practicing location. See NetMinder clients FAQs for more information.
            • Confirmed Medical, Vision, Behavioral Health
              • For medical, vision, and behavioral health clients, the indicator is driven by address confidence score where high and medium confidence locations are confirmed and low confidence locations are unconfirmed. You can learn more about Confidence Scores here.
